comments.body:
Khisanth.2948:

As far as the graph is concerned it doesn’t really seem much different from what spidy, guildwarstrade, etc. are providing. Not sure how this relates to the API.

Prices are pulled from the Black Lion API every minute instead of every 15-30+ as with the other indexing sites. The refresh interval will be lowered once things are more stable. The graph is primarily there to help visualize short-term changes in ecto prices.

comments.body:
Inspired by the video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gcuQqclFzog

I put together a site that pulls the buys/sells from the Black Lion Trading Post and pushes them to the web browser along with a graph that stores averagess for up to 24 hours. Prices are updated every minute.

http://ecto.soosc.net

As I don’t play Guild Wars 2 very often, I’m not sure if the data I’m displaying is correct/useful. If someone could pm with me and explain how the trading post works, I could update the site accordingly.
